Replace.Text: 天人合一
One with Nature
拥有自然奇观的城市每回合+8 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。
+8 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city is owns at least one natural wonder tile.
与河流相邻时，圣地获得大量相邻加成。如果拥有与河流相邻的圣地区域，则城市+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度、+2 [ICON_Housing] 住房。如城市市中心坐落在河边，则每回合+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。

Major adjacency bonus for Holy Site if next to a river. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities and +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing to cities if they have a Holy Site district adjacent to a River. +1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city is located adjacent to a river.
每击杀1个战斗单位即可获得等于其战斗力50%的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值（标准速度下）。战斗单位击杀主要和小型文明的单位时，获得等同于对方单位战斗力50%的 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数（标准速度下）。

Bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 50% of the strength of each combat unit killed (on Standard Speed). Receive [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points when a combat unit defeats a major or minor civilization's unit equal to 50% of the opposing unit's strength (on Standard Speed).
大预言家点数
Great Prophet Points
战斗单位击杀主要和小型文明的单位时，获得等同于对方单位战斗力50%的 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数（标准速度下）。（战争之神）
Receive [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points when a combat unit defeats a major or minor civilization's unit equal to 50% of the opposing unit's strength (Standard Speed). (Gold of War Belief)
拥有纪念碑的城市增加10% [ICON_Culture] 文化值。可以使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买纪念碑，用 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值和 [ICON_GOLD] 金币购买纪念碑的费用降低20%。纪念碑的建造速度+25%。

+10% [ICON_Culture] Culture if city has a Monument. May purchase Monument with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Monument are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_FAITH] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +25% [ICON_production] Production towards Monument.
拥有粮仓的城市余粮增加15%。可以使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买粮仓，用 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值和 [ICON_GOLD] 金币购买粮仓的费用降低20%。粮仓的建造速度+25%。

City growth rate is 15% higher if city has a Granary. May purchase Granary with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Granary are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_FAITH] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +25% [ICON_production] Production towards Granary.
建造防御建筑时加速50%，建造圣地时加速30%。没有专业化区域的城市建造区域+50% [ICON_Production] 生产力。城市 [ICON_Strength] 防御力+6，城市 [ICON_Ranged] 远程攻击力+3。

+50% construction speed towards defensive buildings, +30% construction speed towards Holy Site Districts. +50% [ICON_Production] Production towards districts in cities without a specialty district. +6 City [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength. +3 City [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength.
神使
Messenger of the Gods
选择后即可在首都中获得1个侦察单位，若其初始未拥有免费升级，则获得一次免费升级。所有侦察类型的单位+1 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。
When chosen receive a recon unit with free promotion in your capital. The recon unit starts with a free promotion if it does not have. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all Recon Units.
牧场+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和 +1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture from Pastures.
种植园+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和 +2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold from Plantations.
沼泽、绿洲、沙漠泛滥平原提供+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。沼泽提供+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。泛滥平原不再为相邻单元格—1魅力。
+2 [ICON_Production] Production from Marsh, Oasis, and Desert Floodplains. +1 [ICON_Science] Science from Marsh.Floodplain tiles no longer lower adjacent tiles' Appeal.
采集奢侈品资源和加成资源的营地+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和 +1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，所有营地+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production from Camps over Luxury and Bonus resources. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold from all Camps.
从圣地（大预言家）、学院（大科学家）、剧院广场（大作家）、工业区（大工程师）以及商业区（大商业家）处获得的 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人点数+2。
+2 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person Points from Holy Sites (Prophet), Campuses (Scientist), Theater Squares (Writer), Industial Zones (Engineer) and Commercial Hubs (Merchant).
采石场+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。如城市中有采石场，则每回合+3 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。
+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith from Quarries. +3 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city owns a Quarry.
所有奢侈和加成矿 +1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化和 +1 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。如城市拥有采集奢侈或加成资源的矿山，则每回合+2 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。

+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Mines over Luxury and Bonus resources. +2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city owns mines over Luxury or Bonus resources.
魅力为惊艳的单元格提供的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+2。魅力为迷人的单元格提供的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+1。如城市市中心坐落在迷人地块上，则每回合+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数，惊艳则翻倍。

+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith from tiles with Breathtaking Appeal. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from tiles with Charming Appeal. +1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city is located on a Charming tile, doubles for Breathtaking tile.
地热裂缝和火山土单元格提供的 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值+2。每座拥有地热裂缝、火山土或火山（包括火山自然奇观）的城市提供+4 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。

+2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith from Geothermal Fissures and Volcanic Soil. +4 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city owns a Geothermal Fissures, Volcanic Soil or Volcano (Volcanic Wonders included) tile.
极地子民
The People of Polar
市中心相邻每个冻土单元格+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，如城市市中心坐落在冻土地块上，则每回合+2 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。
City center receive +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each Tundra tile. +2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city is located on a Tundra tile.
沙之女神
Goddess of the Desert
市中心相邻每个沙漠单元格 +1 [ICON_Food] 食物和+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，如城市市中心坐落在沙漠地块上，则每回合+2 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。
City center receive +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each Desert tile. +2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city is located on a Desert tile.
边界扩张速度提升15%，城市创建时获得额外4个单元格。生产移民时，+15%建造速度。
Border expansion rate is 15% faster. Extra 4 tiles upon founding cities. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] towads Settler.
圣地区域从每个相邻的冻土单元格+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值 。圣地给相邻的冻土单元格+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
Holy Site districts get +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Tundra tile. Holy Site provides +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture to all adjacent Tundra tiles.
圣地区域从每个相邻的沙漠单元格+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。圣地给相邻的沙漠单元格+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。
Holy Site districts get +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Desert tile. Holy Site provides +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith to all adjacent Desert tiles.
圣地区域从每个相邻的雨林的单元格+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。圣地给相邻的雨林单元格+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化。
Holy Site districts get +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Rainforest tile. Holy Site provides +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture to all adjacent rainforest tiles.
圣地区域从每个相邻的种植园单元格+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，给相邻的种植园单元格 +1 [ICON_Food] 食物和 +1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。 如城市中有种植园，则每回合+3 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。

Holy Site districts get +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Plantation tile. Holy Site provides +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith to all adjacent Plantation tiles. +2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city owns a Plantation.
长生天
Tengri
圣地区域从每个相邻的牧场单元格+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，给相邻的牧场单元格 +1 [ICON_Production] 生产力和 +1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。 如城市中有牧场，则每回合+2 [ICON_GreatProphet] 大预言家点数。

Holy Site districts get +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith from each adjacent Pasture tile. Holy Site provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith to all adjacent Pasture tiles. +2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn if a city owns a Pasture.
农场资源+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。 所有农场+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food from [ICON_Resource_Wheat] Wheats, [ICON_Resource_Rice] Rices and [ICON_Resource_Maize] Maize. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold from Farms.
渔船+1 [ICON_Food] 食物和+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production from Fishing Boats.
所有近海和海洋单元格+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
+1 [ICON_Food] Food from all coast and ocean tiles .
海洋母亲
Ocean Mother
